import React from 'react' import {useEndpoint} from '../useEndpoint' //This is the container to hold filter options export default function FilterContainer() { let [data] = useEndpoint() let allTypes = data.map((product)=>{ return(product.product_type) }) let filteredTypes = [...new Set(allTypes)] let allColors = data.map((data)=>{ return(data.product_colors.map((color)=>{ return(color.colour_name) })) }) let filteredColors = [...new Set(allColors)] return (
Toggle Filters

)})}

)})}
) }
